Posts.Content: Welcome Cookie. Posts.Content: Hi Jguri, Sorry 2 hear of yr diagnoisis,I had a left mastcomy with back flap reconstruction & lymph node biopsy on mar 22 this year.Lymph nodes were clear& all major organs were clear.I had 2 tumours,1 was invasive & the other was still in the milk duct so Im very lucky they got it early....I started my chemo on wed past.My cancer unit does not offer cold cap (I think), I got my bandanas from Ebay,JML Direct,Amazon,& annabandana,all can b found on the internet...I got mine within 4 days of ordering.Im very pleased with them.My cancer unit has a special hairdresser who fitted me with a wig of my choice & cut & styled it 4 me,I also got a bandana,these were free & Im very pleased with the wig,it looked just like my real hair,I get qnother 1 free in 6 mths if I need it,,,I live in Northren Ireland & the cancer services here r second to none. good luck with yr op and results, Love & Light...Ann..x
